com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity

Class ClientCredentialsHttpDestination

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity.AbstractHttpDestination
      • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity.ClientCredentialsHttpDestination
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DestinationProperties, HttpDestination, HttpDestinationProperties

    public final class ClientCredentialsHttpDestination
extends AbstractHttpDestination
    HttpDestination implementation automatically adding an authentication header retrieved from an OAuth2 service with client credentials.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity.HttpDestinationProperties

        HEADER_PROPERTY

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientCredentialsHttpDestination(HttpDestinationProperties baseDestination, ClientCredentials clientCredentials, ClientCredentialsGrantType grantType, URI oauthUri, OAuth2Service oauthService)
      Wraps the given destination and adds the authentication header retrieved from the given OAuth2 service with the given credentials via the given grant type.
      ClientCredentialsHttpDestination(HttpDestinationProperties baseDestination, ClientCredentials clientCredentials, OAuth2ServiceSettings authorizationServerSettings)
      Wraps the given destination and adds the authentication header retrieved from the given OAuth2 service with the given credentials via the given grant type.
      ClientCredentialsHttpDestination(HttpDestinationProperties baseDestination, ClientCredentials clientCredentials, URI oauthUri, OAuth2Service oauthService)
      Wraps the given destination and adds the authentication header retrieved from the given OAuth2 service with the given credentials via the ClientCredentialsGrantType.CLIENT_CREDENTIALS grant type.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientCredentialsHttpDestination

        public ClientCredentialsHttpDestination(@Nonnull
                                        HttpDestinationProperties baseDestination,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        ClientCredentials clientCredentials,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        URI oauthUri,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        OAuth2Service oauthService)
        Wraps the given destination and adds the authentication header retrieved from the given OAuth2 service with the given credentials via the ClientCredentialsGrantType.CLIENT_CREDENTIALS grant type.
        Parameters:
        baseDestination - The destination to wrap.
        clientCredentials - The credentials to be used to retrieve the AuthToken.
        oauthUri - The URI of the OAuth2 service to retrieve the AuthToken from.
        oauthService - OAuth2 service instance to be used to retrieve the AuthToken.

      • ClientCredentialsHttpDestination

        public ClientCredentialsHttpDestination(@Nonnull
                                        HttpDestinationProperties baseDestination,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        ClientCredentials clientCredentials,
                                        @Nullable
                                        ClientCredentialsGrantType grantType,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        URI oauthUri,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        OAuth2Service oauthService)
        Wraps the given destination and adds the authentication header retrieved from the given OAuth2 service with the given credentials via the given grant type.
        Parameters:
        baseDestination - The destination to wrap.
        clientCredentials - The credentials to be used to retrieve the AuthToken.
        grantType - The grant type to retrieve the access token with.
        oauthUri - The URI of the OAuth2 service to retrieve the AuthToken from.
        oauthService - OAuth2 service instance to be used to retrieve the AuthToken.

        Wraps the given destination and adds the authentication header retrieved from the given OAuth2 service with the given credentials via the given grant type.
        Parameters:
        baseDestination - The destination to wrap.
        clientCredentials - The credentials to be used to retrieve the AuthToken.
        authorizationServerSettings - The settings of the Authorization Server

public Collection<Header> getHeaders(@Nonnull
